oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mevâhibü'l-hallâk fî merâtibi'l-ahlâk : manuscript, undated
Mevahibü'l-hallâk fî merâtibi'l-ahlâk
Mawāhib al-khallāq fī marātib al-akhlāq
Mevahib ül-hallāk fi meratib il-ahlāk
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mustafa Çelebi Celâlzade , -1567
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Work on ethics accompanied by exemplary anecdotes from Islamic history.
Written in naskh script occasionally vocalized, 21 lines per page, in black framed within red line. Headings, some Qurʼanic verses in red. Red dots in text. Catchwords.
Thick light-cream laid paper. No binding. First and last fascicules not attached to body of book.
Incomplete at beginning and end. First two chapters and last nineteen chapters are missing.
MS Turk 29. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islamic ethics
Islamic philosophy
Muslims--Conduct of life
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Karateke, Ottoman Turkish manuscripts and documents at Harvard's Houghton Library,
